feed.subtitle: Starting next week I will be teaching a course at the Bainbridge Graduate Institute on the topic of "Using the Social Web for Social Change". [post continues with details...]

entry.title: Robert Q. Benedict commented on 'Teaching "Using the Social Web for Social Change" at BGI.edu'

link.title: Hi Christopher, We've done a lot of work in this area in the past couple of years at Changemakers.com. We've...

entry.summary: Hi Christopher, We've done a lot of work in this area in the past couple of years at Changemakers.com. We've...
entry.content:
Hi Christopher,

We've done a lot of work in this area in the past couple of years at Changemakers.com. We've been running online competitions to surface social innovation with corporate partners like Nike and foundation partners like the Robert Wood Johnson Foundation. We've learned a lot and would welcome the chance to spread some of that knowledge. Good luck, looks like a great place!
